session.speaker: Josh Grant
session.bio: I'm Josh Grant, a test automation specialist with nearly a decade of work experience in test automation. I've worked with desktop UI automation, unit testing, integration testing and Selenium-based testing with several languages and tools. Currently I am a Solution Architect for Sauce Labs (www.saucelabs.com), helping customers solve their pressing test automation problems and helping teams succeed with test automation. I currently live in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
session.title: PyTest - The Awesome Parts
session.abstract: Python is a popular language for development, but it's also a great choice for test automation. Here I'll discuss some great plugins and features of PyTest, a Python-based test runner and framework. I'll show how these tools are helpful for Python developers but also why they encourage good test automation approaches and patterns.
